description: Try our easy to follow Blue Grenadier Wrapped In Prosciutto With Basil Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Blue Grenadier Wrapped In Prosciutto With Basil Pesto
name: Blue Grenadier Wrapped In Prosciutto With Basil Pesto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Add fish, skin-side down, and cook for 3 minutes each side or until golden. Serve with rocket, lemon and pesto.
